scripts.watch-need-help: echo 256 | sudo tee -a /proc/sys/fs/inotify/max_user_instances && echo 32768 | sudo tee -a /proc/sys/fs/inotify/max_queued_events && echo 65536 | sudo tee -a /proc/sys/fs/inotify/max_user_watches && watchman shutdown-server
scripts.android-linux: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res && react-native run-android
